an2.113:1: "Bhikkhus, the taints do not increase for twokinds of persons. What two? One who perceives what is not an offense as no offense and one who perceives what is an offense as an offense.[n.33] Here, too,Beinverts the clauses, reading:Yo ca āpattiyā āpattisaññī,yo ca anāpattiyā anāpattisaññī.The taints do not increase for these twokinds of persons."
